item.description:
Hi All,

Sorry to be posting this with such short notice, but I thought I'd have a knitting potluck for whoever wants to come and hang out and check out my book and yarn collection and the new place. I know my collection is not a cool as Donna's but hey, it's not too shabby :) We'll knit and order pizza :) I'm thinking like from 11 am to 3 pm ish this Saturday April 1, 2006, and we'll order the pizza around noon ish once we've decided what we want.

Because I'm not comfortable with pasting directions and my address on the net, RSVP or email me if you're coming and I'll send you directions and my phone number.

See you Saturday hopefully :)

Denise
item.name: Saturday Knitting Potluck at Denise's Apartment
